content: Yes, there are many great places to experience Dia de los Muertos! Some of the most famous celebrations take place in Mexico, particularly in Oaxaca, Mexico City, and the small town of Mixquic. However, this holiday is celebrated in a growing number of locations around the world, particularly in areas with large Mexican-American populations. Some other popular destinations to celebrate Dia de los Muertos include San Francisco, California, where the annual "Day of the Dead" festival takes place; Tucson, Arizona, where a large parade is held; and Albuquerque, New Mexico, which hosts a "Muertos y Marigolds" festival.
